General_Description: '''Beating the Hammer''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta|Enemy]] [[Brute]]s pose too powerful a threat on the battlefield. They must be taken out before they shed more blood."   — Leader of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Spartan brutes in the region, and was rewarded for doing so.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Athens's Fury]] and [[Flat Muscles]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
